post:
[NL] FirstHosting -- 4GB Ram - 4 Xeon Cores - Free cPanel - Free zamFoo & Softaculous

FirstHosting is in hosting business since 2009 and providing standard webhosting services like Shared/Reseller etc. Now we are going to offer special Virtual Private servers on our most clients request. This March we had a Second Anniversary and going to announce one more part of hosting world.

All of our Virtual Private Servers come with Pre-Installed cPanel/WHM , zamFoo and softaculous with 1GB UPLINK Port.


We only accept Paypal at the moment as a payment source.

Lets take a look at offers.

===================OpenVZ Plans=================

OpenVZ Package Comparison Page: http://firsthosting.us/managed-vps.html

--- OpenVZ VPS Plan V-OFF-3---
+ Dedicated RAM: 6 GB
+ Burst Ram: 8 GB
+ Disk Space: 100GB!
+ Bandwidth: 10,000 GB!
+ FREE Private Network Access (VPS to VPS or VPS to Dedicated)
+ 1 GB Uplink Port
+ IPAddresses: 2
+ Free cPanel/WHM
+ Free zamFoo
+ Free Softaculous

http://my.firsthosting.us/cart.php?gid=14 Order Managed VPS NOW $54.95/Month

----------------------------------

Remote Panel to control your VPS
You can also control you VPS remotely, which include following features.
+ Reboot
+ Shutdown
+ Boot
+ Re-install OS
+ Root Password
+ Hostname
+ Console Settings
+ Console
+ API Settings

+ Main IP
+ Statistics
+ Logs

All these VPS comes with full management which include all pre-installations.

VPS Location - Netherlands
